Package com.advertisementproject.zuulgateway.ZuulFilter

Class ZuulRequestFilter

java.lang.Object
com.netflix.zuul.ZuulFilter
com.advertisementproject.zuulgateway.ZuulFilter.ZuulRequestFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.netflix.zuul.IZuulFilter, java.lang.Comparable<com.netflix.zuul.ZuulFilter>
public class ZuulRequestFilter
extends com.netflix.zuul.ZuulFilter
Zuul Filter that extracts the user id from a bearer token in the request header and attaches the user id to be forwarded to the requested endpoint. Also logs which type of request is being routed and to which endpoint.

  • Nested Class Summary

      Returns:

    • run

      public java.lang.Object run()
      Runs the filter. Extracts user id from jwt token in header using JwtUtils and attaches it to the header of the request which is about to be forwarded. Logs which type of request has been sent and to which endpoint.
      Returns:
      null
